alert.note: Alert for Conejos (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 1:17PM MDT until July 01 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Conejos County in south central Colorado... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 117 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Capulin, or 24 miles southwest of Alamosa, moving east at 10 mph. Other strong thunderstorms were developing farther east, from the Romeo to Conejos areas, and could become severe. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manassa, Antonito, Romeo, Conejos and Ortiz. This also includes U.S. Highway 285. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
